name: NYU Portfolio Submission
description:
Realm of the Haunted is an ongoing project I have been working on by myself since early July 2021. I started learning the Unity Engine with very little prior experience in both the engine and C#, and learned 3D modeling in Blender with no prior experience. All game assets, code and art, are completely created by me, although sound effects are found on freesound.org. The game is a current work in progress, for now it is only a sandbox with no real objective.  Please check out the showcase, it displays weapon and enemy models that are from the game.

PLATFORM REQUIREMENTS

only functional on Windows systems 

DOWNLOAD INSTRUCTIONS

Install ZIP file

Unzip folder

Open exe file

CONTROLS:

WASD - movement

Right Click - aim

Left Click - attack

F - dash

Spacebar - jump (hold to glide)

Number Keys - switch weapons

Shift - sprint

ESC - settings

(SHOWCASE CONTROLS)

Scroll Wheel - switch between currently displayed object of category

Q / E - switch between categories
